channel.title: Musings - snippets of advice & inspiration from people in the web industry

item.title: Pursue Passionate Projects
item.description: Create something you’re passionate about chances are you’ll try harder.

item.title: Critique
item.description: Critique is not personal. Ask for it, accept it, think on it and only if appropriate, implement it. Disregarding it is perfectly acceptable.

item.title: RTFM
item.description: Read the manual. Nothing beats knowing the foundations of what you’re trying to learn.

item.title: Design for your users
item.description: Don’t design to impress your peers, but for your users.
